column1: The movie was extremely exciting from beginning to end.  I loved every minute!
This was a disaster – poor storytelling, poor artistic direction, poor acting.  Avoid.
The actors were all excellent and the story was gripping.
I thought some scenes were ok, but largely the story just didn’t grip me.
I think this is the best film I have ever watched.
The acting was great.  The special effects were rubbish.
